learningResources.title: Screen time recommendations by age
learningResources.objective: Educate yourself on finding the right balance of screen time for your child

learningResources.title: Beyond Screen Time: Help Your Kids Build Healthy Media Use Habits
learningResources.objective: Provides you with media use guidelines for your family

learningResources.title: Screen Time Guidelines
learningResources.objective: Offers several additional resources on screen time guidelines for social media applications recommended by AAP

learningResources.title: Babies need humans, not screens
learningResources.objective: Find out why, and how too much screen time can harm your child advocated by UNICEF

learningResources.title: What Does Too Much Screen Time Do to Children’s Brains?
learningResources.objective: Understand why screen time should be limited for your kid and why some screens are better than others.

learningResources.title: Screen Time and Children
learningResources.objective: Learn about the detrimental consequesnces associated with too much screen time and how to manage it

learningResources.title: Screen Time Guidelines by Age
learningResources.objective: Investigation on what constitutes an appropriate screen time duration for your child according to their age

learningResources.title:
Screen time and young children: Promoting health and
development in a digital world
learningResources.objective: Learn some important trends necessary to reshape early childhood in this digital landscape.

learningResources.title:
Effects of Excessive Screen Time on Child Development: 
An Updated Review and Strategies for Management
learningResources.objective: Research on how can you reduce the negative impacts of excessive screen time and promote your child's healthy development

learningResources.title: Clinical and psychological effects of excessive screen time on children
learningResources.objective: A discussion on the positive and negative effects of screen time on the physiological and psychological development of children along with recommendations offered to parents and clinicians.

learningResources.title:
Screen Time Tantrums: 
How Families Manage Screen Media Experiences for Toddlers and Preschoolers
learningResources.objective: Provides an understanding of parent attitudes toward their children’s screen time from their own screen-based experiences.

learningResources.title:
The Ubiquity of the Screen: 
An Overview of the Risks and Benefits of Screen Time in Our Modern World
learningResources.objective: Get informed about the investigation on current screen time guidelines around the world and risks associated with it.

learningResources.title: Pediatrician Advice: Screen Time Effects On Children (Create ScreenTime Rules)
learningResources.objective: Know the limitations on screen media that you should give your children to foster development through this research behind screens and learn how to create a screen time plan.

learningResources.title: Effects of Television On Young Children (Interview With Top Voted Pediatrician)
learningResources.objective: Get informed on how you can boost interaction with your child though co-viewing approach.

learningResources.title: Screens May Affect Your Child's Brain Development | Better | NBC News
learningResources.objective: Acknowledges you on the various side-effects on your child's cognitive development

learningResources.title: How to Manage Your Child’s Screen Time
learningResources.objective: Get some additional tips when typical screen time rules might not apply in your house for the moment.

learningResources.title: Manage your child's screen time | Parenting - 102
learningResources.objective: Familiarize on how much freedom is good and how to manage the environment when your kid is addicted to screens.
